			'zephr_tracking_id',
			'ga_aut_id',
			'aqfer_puu',
		  ];

		  const intervalTime = 250;
		  const maxWaitTime = 2000;

		  function checkForRequiredDim() {
			const foundKey = targetKeys.find(key => window.ga4Dims.hasOwnProperty(key) && window.ga4Dims[key] !== null);

			if (foundKey !== undefined) {
			  gtag('event', 'page_view', window.ga4Dims);

				console.log(`At least one key found with a non-null value: ${foundKey}. Sending the page_view.`);
			  }
			} else {
			  const elapsedTime = Date.now() - startTime;
			  if (isGA4DebugMode) {
				console.log(`None of the keys found with a non-null value. Elapsed time: ${elapsedTime} ms`);
			  }

			  if (elapsedTime >= maxWaitTime) {
				gtag('event', 'page_view', window.ga4Dims);
				clearInterval(intervalId);
				if (isGA4DebugMode) {
				  console.log(`Maximum wait time exceeded. Stopping the search and send the page_view.`);
				}
			  }
			}
		  }

		  const startTime = Date.now();
		  const intervalId = setInterval(checkForRequiredDim, intervalTime);

			})(window,document,'script','//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js','ga');

			(function() {

				// Set the default options for the Google Analytics "create" function.
				var gaCreateOptions = {
					trackingId: "UA-3922003-6",
					cookieDomain: 'auto',
					useAmpClientId: true
				};

				// Add the allowLinker option if it is configured and found in PHP.
									gaCreateOptions.allowLinker = true;
					
				var isLsAvailable = function() {
					var test = 'test';
					try {
						window.localStorage.setItem(test, test);
						window.localStorage.removeItem(test);
						return true;
					} catch (e) {
						return false;
					}
				}

				// Bail early and use the old method if we do not have localStorage in this browser.
				if ( ! isLsAvailable() ) {
					ga( 'create', gaCreateOptions );
					return;
				}

				// If we have a GA clientId in the URL.
				var haveClientIdInURL = false;

				// First, check for linker param in URL and let GA use that for our clientId if it exists.
				// Check if URLSearchParams is available, otherwise use a polyfill function.
				if ( 'function' === typeof URLSearchParams ) {
					var urlParams = new URLSearchParams( window.location.search );
					if ( urlParams.get( '_ga' ) ) {
						haveClientIdInURL = true;
					}
				} else {
					/**
					 * A polyfill for older browsers like IE.
					 * @link https://caniuse.com/#feat=urlsearchparams
					 * @link https://davidwalsh.name/query-string-javascript
					 */
					var getUrlParameter = function(name) {
						name = name.replace( /[\[]/, '\\[' ).replace( /[\]]/, '\\]' );
						var regex = new RegExp('[\\?&]' + name + '=([^&#]*)');
						var results = regex.exec( location.search );
						return results === null ? false : decodeURIComponent( results[1].replace( /\+/g, ' ' ) );
					};
					if ( getUrlParameter( '_ga' ) ) {
						haveClientIdInURL = true;
					}
				}

				// Assume the GA Cookie is not present.
				var hasGACookie = false;

				// Try to get the GA Cookie.
				var GACookie = document.cookie.split(';').filter(function(item) {
					return item.trim().indexOf('_ga=') === 0
				} );

				// Check if we have a cookie.
				if ( GACookie.length ) {
					// If the cookie value is not empty we have a GA cookie.
					hasGACookie = GACookie[0].trim().length > 4 ? true : false;
				}

				// Id to use for localStorage object which holds the GA clientId and expire time.
				var gaClientIdLocalStorageId = 'nyp_ga_client_id';

				// If we don't have a clientId in the URL and there is no GA cookie set, we look in localStorage for one.
				if ( ! haveClientIdInURL && ! hasGACookie ) {

					// If no linker param and no GA cookie, we check in localStorage for the GA clientId.
					var nypGALocalStorage = window.localStorage.getItem( gaClientIdLocalStorageId ) || '{}';
					var parsedNYPGALocalStorage = JSON.parse( nypGALocalStorage );
					var now = new Date().getTime();
					if ( parsedNYPGALocalStorage.clientId && parsedNYPGALocalStorage.expires ) {
						if ( now <= parsedNYPGALocalStorage.expires ) {

							// If we have the clientId, add it to the GA Tracker options.
							if ( parsedNYPGALocalStorage.clientId && '' !== parsedNYPGALocalStorage.clientId ) {
								gaCreateOptions.clientId = parsedNYPGALocalStorage.clientId;
							}
						}
					}
				}

				// Create the tracker instance.
				ga( 'create', gaCreateOptions );

				// Add the clientId to localStorage using readyCallback to ensure the tracker instance has been instantiated.
				ga( function( tracker ) {
					var clientId = tracker.get( 'clientId' );
					if ( clientId ) {
						var gaClientIdStore = JSON.stringify({
							clientId: clientId,
							expires: new Date().getTime() + 1000*60*60*24*365*2
						});
						window.localStorage.setItem( gaClientIdLocalStorageId, gaClientIdStore );
					}

					// Set the client ID as a dimension for tracking against with Aqfer.
					ga( 'set', 'dimension88', clientId );
					window.ga4Dims = window.ga4Dims || {};
					window.ga4Dims.aqfer_puu = clientId;
				});

				if ('function' === typeof CustomEvent) {
					window.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('ga:loaded'));
				}
			})();

			ga('require', 'linker');
ga('linker:autoLink', ["nypost.com","pagesix.com","decider.com"])

			window.optimizely = window.optimizely || [];
			window.optimizely.push(['activateUniversalAnalytics']);

e;n.supports.everything||(n.readyCallback(),(e=n.source||{}).concatemoji?t(e.concatemoji):e.wpemoji&&e.twemoji&&(t(e.twemoji),t(e.wpemoji)))}))}((window,document),window._wpemojiSettings);
</script>

								My custom record player was delivered in under 4 days for less...							</h5>

						<div class="single__content entry-content m-bottom ">
								<aside class="commerce-disclosure">
		New York Post may be compensated and/or receive an affiliate commission if you buy through our links.
	</aside>
	


<p>Women can be a tough nut to crack sometimes, especially when <em>shopping for </em>mom. Sometimes, it seems like the go-to floral bouquet is becoming somewhat lackluster  though we love <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-places-to-order-and-send-flowers-online/">flower delivery services</a>.</p>



<p>Whether you&#8217;re <a href="https://go.linkby.com/PCTEQQTQ/collections/mothers-day-gift-guide" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">shopping for your mom</a>, mother-in-law or the mother-in-law you wish you had, we ran through the gamut of gift ideas. From <a href="https://go.linkby.com/PCTEQQTQ/products/heart-bracelets-mommy-me" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">&#8220;Mommy and Me&#8221;</a> matching jewelry from <a href="https://go.linkby.com/PCTEQQTQ/collections/mothers-day-gift-guide" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">Zoe Lev </a>to <a href="https://nypost.com/shopping/best-cheap-amazon-mothers-day-gifts-2024/">Mother&#8217;s Day</a>-inspired picks from <a href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=93051X1547088&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=nyp-GG---bestgiftideasforwomen&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.markandgraham.com%2Fshop%2Fgift-shops%2Fpersonalized-valentines-gifts%2F%3Fcm_type%3Dgnav" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">Mark &amp; Graham</a>, we&#8217;ve searched everywhere to provide our edit of the best gifts for women practically <em>ever</em>. But we&#8217;re a bit biased.</p>



<p>We&#8217;ve got picks from <a href="https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=30347&amp;awinaffid=796935&amp;campaign=&amp;clickref=nyp-GG---bestgiftideasforwomen&amp;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fshop.lululemon.com%2F&amp;platform=pl" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">lululemon</a>, <a href="https://our-place.pxf.io/c/2229206/1679350/19449?subId1=nyp-GG---bestgiftideasforwomen&amp;u=https%3A%2F%2Ffromourplace.com%2F" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">Our Place</a>, and even some pretty jewelry options from  <a href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=93051X1547088&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=nyp-GG---bestgiftideasforwomen&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.monicavinader.com%2Fus%2F" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">Kendra Scott</a>, and <a href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=93051X1547088&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=nyp-GG---bestgiftideasforwomen&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.monicavinader.com%2Fus%2F" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">Monica Vinader</a>, can you tell we&#8217;re excited? </p>



<p>Our list is filled with practical, everyday items that they&#8217;ll come to love, in addition to some of the most sought-after items we&#8217;ve seen. Whichever way you go, we&#8217;re certain that any of these picks will be adored, cherished, and appreciated.</p>

The Stanley IceFlow AeroLight Bottle with Fast Flow Lid is slim, lightweight, and comes with a handle to easily tote it from work to the cycle studio. Armed with double-wall vacuum insulation, it keeps a beverage cold for 15 hours and has a leakproof angled lid for maximum pour control. Best of all, its available in eight different gorgeous colors and four different sizes.</p>

<p>For a unique gift idea that&#8217;s sure to be cherished  especially when traveling  the Mark &amp; Graham Small Jewelry Travel Case is our go-to recommendation. It&#8217;s a fairly priced option that you can choose to personalize for an additional $12.50, picking from the brand&#8217;s suite of colors and patterns upon checkout.</p>



<p>Its pebbled vegan leather is encased with a soft linen lining and silver hardware to measure up to that high-quality gift she desires. More, its its <a href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=93051X1547088&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=nyp-GG---&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.markandgraham.com%2Fproducts%2Fmonogrammed-commute-clutch-pouch%2F%3Fpkey%3Dcpersonalized-travel-cosmetic-bag" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">Commute Clutch</a> ($129) gets packed with us every time.</p>

<p>Everyone and their mother (and, honestly, grandmother), loves Trader Joe&#8217;s. For <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-items-under-25-on-amazon/">less than $25 on Amazon</a>, the Trader Joe&#8217;s 5 Items or Less Cookbook is probably one of our favorite finds  and one we want to add to our carts stat.</p>

<p>For sustainably made jewelry designed for the minimalist, Monica Vinader has the most premium of fashions, much like its Mini Nugget Pearl Beaded Bracelet. Specifically, its natural pearls, recycled gold and silver accents and responsibly manufactured process to create it is simply impressive.</p>



<p>Other favorite items to look into for gift-giving include its <a href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=93051X1547088&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=nyp-GG---&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.monicavinader.com%2Fus%2Fintaglio-dove-chain-necklace-adjustable-41-46cm-16-18%2Fgold-vermeil-intaglio-dove-necklace-adjustable-41-46cm-16-18-amethyst" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">Intaglio Adjustable Dove Necklace</a> ($195)  featuring a stunning amethyst dove at the center  <a href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=93051X1547088&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=nyp-GG---&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.monicavinader.com%2Fus%2Fswirl-medium-hoop-earrings%2Fgold-vermeil-swirl-medium-hoop-earrings" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">Swirl Medium Hoop Earrings</a> ($175) and <a href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=93051X1547088&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=nyp-GG---&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.monicavinader.com%2Fus%2Ftiny-pearl-scatter-necklace%2Fgold-vermeil-pearl-scatter-necklace-adjustable-41-46cm-16-18-pearl" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">Pearl Scatter Adjustable Necklace</a> ($250), the latter matching the bracelet quite perfectly. </p>

<p>If you&#8217;re looking for a sweet and affordable gift, you&#8217;ll like this pick. The Berries &#8216;N Choco Kisses Set from LANEIGE has the brand&#8217;s infamous sleeping lip mask, as well as a moisturizing lip balm to soothe a dry pucker. Perfect for Valentine&#8217;s Day or Galentine&#8217;s Day, the set isn&#8217;t even $30, and packs a ton of moisture.</p>

<p>Enter a gift we&#8217;re already planning to share with everyone we know IRL. The Dagne Dover Mara Neoprene Phone Sling is a phenomenal <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-affordable-cheap-christmas-gifts/">gift for less than $100</a>, thanks to its cushion-soft feel and practical charm. In short, it&#8217;s the lovechild of your favorite <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-belt-bags-and-fanny-packs/">belt bag</a> and <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-crossbody-bags-for-women/">crossbody</a>.</p>



<p>We&#8217;re not finished raving about Dagne Dover, either. We equally love its <a href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=93051X1547088&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=nyp-GG---&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.dagnedover.com%2Fcollections%2Fthe-landon-carryall%23Dune-ExtraLarge" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">Landon Neoprene Carryall Bag</a> ($125 &#8211; $245)  a quality <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-duffle-bags/">duffle bag</a>  and <a href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=93051X1547088&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=nyp-GG---&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.dagnedover.com%2Fcollections%2Fthe-hunter-toiletry-bag%23Dune-Small" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">Hunter Neoprene Toiletry Bag</a> ($45 &#8211; $65) that makes traveling a snap.</p>

<p>Real talk  the lululemon Chargefeel 2 Mid Workout Shoe is our comfiest pair yet (read our full <a href="https://nypost.com/2023/08/21/lululemon-chargefeel-2-sneakers-review-best-sneakers-ever/">review</a> for more) and offer incredible movement, support and flexibility. The brand offers the <a href="https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=30347&amp;awinaffid=796935&amp;campaign=&amp;clickref=nyp-GG---&amp;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fshop.lululemon.com%2Fp%2Fshoes%2FW-Chargefeel-Workout-Low-2%2F_%2Fprod11500242%3Fcolor%3D62983&amp;platform=pl" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">Chargefeel 2 Low Workout Shoe</a> ($138) as well, though we&#8217;re too in love with the higher-ups because the additional, moisture-wicking fabric helps prevent blisters even more.</p>



<p>Can&#8217;t get enough of lulu? Pick up the brand&#8217;s <a href="https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=30347&amp;awinaffid=796935&amp;campaign=&amp;clickref=nyp-GG---&amp;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fshop.lululemon.com%2Fp%2Fwomen-socks%2FDaily-Stride-No-Show-3-Pack-W%2F_%2Fprod11460160&amp;platform=pl" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">Daily Stride Comfort No-Show Socks</a> ($34) and waitlist-inducing <a href="https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=30347&amp;awinaffid=796935&amp;campaign=&amp;clickref=nyp-GG---&amp;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fshop.lululemon.com%2Fp%2Fbags%2FEverywhere-Belt-Bag%2F_%2Fprod8900747%3Fcolor%3D62538%26sz%3DONESIZE&amp;platform=pl" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">Everywhere Belt Bag</a> ($38) for a more complete gift.</p>

<p>We can&#8217;t say enough good things about the Our Place Always Pan 2.0. <p>This trusty kitchen staple is said to replace 10 pieces of cookware  yes, you read that correctly  and is all abuzz on social media. &#8220;Deep enough to roast a chicken, shallow enough to flip an egg, the Always Pan 2.0 is the gold standard for versatility,&#8221; per Our Place. </p>

<p>A silk robe is one of those things most of us would like but won&#8217;t treat ourselves to. Fortunately, that&#8217;s where thoughtful folks like you come in. If that resonates, we suggest going with this robe from LILYSILK. It&#8217;s currently on sale for Valentine&#8217;s Day, ships free, and is made of luxurious 100% mulberry silk. Timelessly classic, we&#8217;re jealous of whomever gets to slip it on. </p>

<p>Your new favorite hair tool is the Dyson Airstrait  a product we didn&#8217;t know could measure up to the bran&#8217;d top-rated <a href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=93051X1547088&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=nyp-GG---&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.dyson.com%2Fhair-care%2Fhair-stylers%2Fairwrap%2Fcomplete-long-blue-copper" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">Airwrap Multi-Styler Complete</a> ($600) but somehow did. </p>



<p>We <a href="https://nypost.com/article/dyson-airstrait-hair-straightener-review/">reviewed</a> the Dyson Airstrait and can attest it&#8217;s the quickest hair tool to take your hair from damp to dry. That&#8217;s right  no lineup of <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-hair-straighteners-and-flat-irons-review/">hair straighteners</a> and <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-curling-irons-and-wands/">curling irons</a>, and no waiting for your device to heat up. It&#8217;s available to order from <em>so </em>many spots online, and is a gift we anticipate trending this year.</p>

Or, if you&#8217;re feeling lovey dovey, choose your own, so they can take a piece of you wherever they go.</p>

<p>Because who doesn&#8217;t want to be supple, soft and tight in all the right places? We know the beauty cult classic Bum Bum Cream needs no introduction, but this gift set also includes the Pistachio &amp; Salted Caramel Fragrance Mist, as well as the Brazilian Play Moisturizing Shower Cream Gel. Each smells fantastic, is free of sulfates and parabens, and totally cruelty-free! Everything comes in this cute travel bag and makes an awesome gift idea for women for Valentine&#8217;s Day, birthdays or just because.</p>

<p>The particular membership you choose, whether monthly or annually, is up to you and your personal budget. Your gift recipient will also enjoy the brand&#8217;s new immersive nature content in its National Park Collection.</p>

<ul>
<li><strong>Sale:</strong> 25% off sitewide with code <strong>NYPOST</strong></li>
</ul>



<p>Personal gifts are the best gifts, which is why we&#8217;re gaga over the Initial Necklace from Becca Prada. Handmade to order, add the initials of the lucky person and yours, along with a center charm, like a heart, butterfly or cross. Available in gold plated, sterling silver and rose gold plated, they&#8217;re sure to love whatever you select for them.</p>

<p>Enter one of the most extraordinary and exquisite gifts this edit has ever seen: the Anthropologie Bistro Tile Margot Monogram Mug. Why is it so great, may you ask? Well, it&#8217;s a personalized, chic option that&#8217;s just shy of $15, allowing the woman you&#8217;re shopping for to sip on her favorite brew after using that <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-coffee-makers-on-amazon/">coffee maker</a> of hers (spoiler alert: <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-gifts-to-shop-from-anthropologie/">some of the best gifts ever hail from Anthropologie</a>).</p>



<p>For more options, check out our guide to the <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-coffee-mugs/">best coffee mugs</a>.</p>

<p>For a stocking stuffer or gift add-on that won&#8217;t cost you more than $15, the Rifle Paper Co. Pocket Notebook Set is one of our top recommendations, with its &#8220;Bon Voyage&#8221; selection apt <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-gifts-for-travelers/">for the woman who loves to travel</a>. Floral patterns are available online, too, and she&#8217;ll love its miniature size to take notes anywhere.</p>

<p>This isn&#8217;t our first year putting together gift guides, and we&#8217;re well-aware Lulus coats are <em>always </em>a hit among our readers. This year, we&#8217;re glossing over the brand&#8217;s Winter Wanderings Plaid Coat  a decadently knitted neutral and muted blue combo that&#8217;s picture-perfect for any crisp and cool day.</p>



<p>For more options, check out our guide to the <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-winter-coats-for-women/">best women&#8217;s coats</a>.</p>

<p>For the crafty, DIY-all-day recipient, buying the Cricut Joy is a no-brainer. The brand offers plenty of variations, though this is the most affordable one and designed to handle basic customization tasks, like creating custom cards, simple decals and labels. Even better, it&#8217;s compact and can create those dazzling projects in 15 minutes or less, per Cricut.</p>

<p>We would be nothing without our favorite playlists (seriously, we take way too much pride in them), and the JBL Go 3 Portable Bluetooth Speaker is an all-around great gift  especially if you don&#8217;t want to spend more than $50. Whether clipped onto her <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-beach-bags/">beach bag</a> for an upcoming vacation or <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-tote-bags-for-work/">work tote</a> for her weekly office commute, rest assured she&#8217;ll appreciate it.</p>



<p>For more options, check out our guide to the <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-portable-bluetooth-speakers/">best portable Bluetooth speakers</a>.</p>

<p>For the chef in your life, there&#8217;s no better gift than a nonstick pan from Caraway. Free of PTFE, PFOA, PFAS, and other toxic materials, the gorgeous pan is oven-safe and can almost hold up to 5 quarts of food. Perfect for sauting, flipping pancakes, and everything in between, she&#8217;ll love it.</p>

<p>Let&#8217;s all bow down to the SPANX Faux Leather Leggings (we&#8217;re not kidding). Still on its viral kick for a few years in the making, these bottoms are perfect for the woman who loves a flattering, put-together look with minimal effort. Not only are they some of the <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-leggings-brands-review/">best leggings we reviewed</a> but they look great with anything  be it some shiny <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-white-sneakers-for-women/">white sneakers</a> or an edgy <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-womens-moto-jackets/">moto jacket</a>.</p>

<p>The 23andMe Health + Ancestry Service is a prime example (literally, thanks to its availability on <a href="https://www.amazon.com/amazonprime?tag=nypost-20&asc_refurl=https://nypost.com/article/best-gift-ideas-for-women/&asc_source=web" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">Amazon Prime</a>) of a gift your loved one is interested in, but may not purchase for herself. Luckily for you, it&#8217;s a service we <a href="https://nypost.com/article/ancestry-vs-23-and-me-dna-test-kit-reviews/">reviewed</a> and have since been super impressed by, thanks to its efficacy in digging through your DNA to provide insights on family history, genetics and more. Hey, you may even meet a new, distant relative like we did.</p>

<p>Shop the Lulu Candles Espresso Bean Luxury Scented Soy Jar Candle if the woman you&#8217;re gift-giving to spends a good chunk of her time at Dunkin&#8217; or Starbucks. This <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-items-under-25-on-amazon/">less-than-$25 Amazon buy</a> sits nice and pretty on our nightstands and gives supreme coffeehouse vibes (impressively, even when it&#8217;s not burned).</p>

<p>Meet our favorite work bag in the history of all creation: the Lux &amp; Nyx Large Origami Ultra Satin 15&#8243; Laptop Tote. No dramatics here, we&#8217;re just <em>that </em>obsessed with it. The bag&#8217;s exterior never becomes stained or tarnished thanks to its smooth feel and it doesn&#8217;t weigh heavy on your shoulders (even when it&#8217;s fully stocked with your <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-laptops-and-computers-on-amazon/">laptop</a>, lunch-carrying <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-meal-prep-containers/">meal prep container</a> and <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-water-bottles-top-brands/">reusable water bottle</a>.</p>



<p>More, Lux &amp; Nyx offers this tote in a medium-sized option for $248, and it&#8217;s available in additional colorways.</p>

<p>We scream, you scream, we all scream for&#8230;the Ninja CREAMi Ice Cream Maker. Without a shadow of a doubt, it&#8217;s one of the greatest products we <a href="https://nypost.com/article/ninja-creami-review/">reviewed</a> this year (and one we didn&#8217;t mind testing either; why would we say no to ice cream?!) It&#8217;s compact enough to store when finished and  drumroll please  you can even make gelato.</p>



<p>For more options, check out our guide to the <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-ice-cream-makers-machines/">best ice cream makers</a>.</p>

<p>The Revlon One-Step Volumizer Enhanced 1.0 Hair Dryer and Hot Air Brush is still having her time in the spotlight, and we&#8217;re simply going to let it ride. This trusty <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-blow-dryers-review/">blow dryer</a> is well-loved for its budget-friendly price point and easy-to-achieve salon look (proof: we <a href="https://nypost.com/article/revlon-one-step-hair-dryer-brush-review/">reviewed</a> it). It&#8217;s also a No.1 <a href="https://nypost.com/article/amazon-best-sellers-products-finds/">Amazon best-seller</a> with nearly 16,000 gleaming reviews from beauty enthusiasts nationwide.</p>



<p>If your budget is a bit wider or you&#8217;re interested in a more high-end option, we rank the <a href="https://shop-links.co/1817724250483151360?u1=nyp-GG---" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">amika Hair Blow Dryer Brush 2.0</a> ($100)  that we <a href="https://nypost.com/article/amika-blow-dryer-brush-review/">reviewed</a>, too  the <a href="https://shop-links.co/1817724321256835677?u1=nyp-GG---" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">Drybar The Double Shot Blow-Dryer Brush</a> ($155) and the <a href="https://shop-links.co/1817724380591087246?u1=nyp-GG---" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">T3 AireBrush Duo Interchangeable Hot Air Blow Dry Brush</a> ($190) highly after using them for years.</p>

The split front design adds a fashionable edge, making it an ideal present for the woman who values both comfort and on-trend fashion.</p>

<p>Fun fact: the SMEG 50s Retro-Style 2-Slice Toaster was the <em>exact </em>pink-colored one that was seen in this year&#8217;s <a href="https://nypost.com/2023/07/24/shop-barbies-exact-pink-smeg-toaster-from-the-movie/">&#8220;Barbie&#8221; movie</a>, but that&#8217;s not the only reason we love it and think it&#8217;s an exceptional gift. It&#8217;s a well-balanced kitchen appliance that marries a blast-to-the-past style with modernity  and it&#8217;s easily functional, too.</p>



<p>Available at plenty of online retailers, simply add the color you prefer to your cart, glamor over its powder-coated steel exterior and adore its ability to make avocado toast just the way you like it.</p>



<p>For more options, check out our guide to the <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-toaster-ovens-under-200/">best toaster ovens for less than $200</a>.</p>

<p>Would this gift guide <em>actually </em>be complete without a mention of the world&#8217;s most-raved-about item? Yes, we&#8217;re just as on board with the Stanley Quencher H2.0 FlowState Stainless Steel Vacuum-Insulated Tumbler with Lid and Straw as you are.</p>



<p>Though $45 may seem like a pretty penny to drop on a water bottle  it&#8217;s not just any water bottle. You&#8217;ll find its chic, durable design inspires you to stay hydrated and enjoy ice-cold water all day. Plus, it&#8217;s a gift the woman in your life likely has on her wishlist. </p>

<p>Photo-based gifts are a wonderful idea for any recipient, and we&#8217;re willing to bet the Artifact Uprising Modern Wall Tile  however many you bundle into your online shopping cart  will be fitting for the occasion. The best part? It&#8217;s perfect &#8220;for those who want to make their mark without leaving one,&#8221; per the brand, all because its adhesive backing allows for simple hanging and adjusting without the need for hammers or holes.</p>



<p>Each frame is made of real wood and its glassless frame allows the warmth and texture of press-printed paper to beautifully adorn your home. We&#8217;re practically making our gallery walls as we speak.</p>

<p>Give the woman in your life &#8220;the shower experience&#8221; (if you&#8217;re unfamiliar, it&#8217;s when all of the washes, oils, lotions and potions come out to <em>really </em>rein in that self care). Fitting the bill is one of our favorite couples, the OSEA Malibu Mega Moisture Duo. </p>



<p>Inside, you&#8217;ll find the brand&#8217;s Undaria Algae Body Oil and Undaria Collagen Body Lotion  both of which are incredibly rich, moisturizing and soothing. Now, find the two-pack for less than $100 and, if you want to offer an even more magnificent experience, pick up the <a href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=93051X1547088&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=nyp-GG---&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Foseamalibu.com%2Fproducts%2Fundaria-algae-body-butter" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">Undaria Algae Body Butter</a> ($56) that we named the best we <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-body-butter/">reviewed</a>.</p>

<p>Cozy Earth has &#8220;cozy&#8221; in its name for a reason. Simply put, the brand&#8217;s offerings  from its <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-cute-comfortable-womens-loungewear-sets/">loungewear</a> to its <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-bed-sheets-reviews/">bed sheets</a>  are the softest you&#8217;ll experience. The Waffle Bath Robe is no different, serving as the ideal wrap-around to cozy up in post-shower. Made with viscose bamboo, it&#8217;s ideal for any at-home spa day and offered in light gray and charcoal hues, too.</p>



<p>For more options, check out our guide to the <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-robes/">best robes</a>.</p>

<p>For the woman who loves to be active, hook her up with an Alo Moves Membership. Depending on your budget and membership length of choice, it&#8217;s a personalized program she&#8217;ll come to love  offering yoga, pilates, barre, meditation and more from her device. Its powered by a team of top instructors to help reach personal wellness goals, too.</p>

<p>Hello, practical and cute <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-stocking-stuffer-ideas-for-everyone/">stocking stuffer</a> idea. We&#8217;re all about the cobinaan Medium Claw Clips (6-Pack) because they&#8217;re the ideal size to *<em>get that hair out of your face</em>* and come in a wealth of colors to match and contrast with your hair color. Now, they&#8217;re less than $10, and we&#8217;re just about to pick them up, too.</p>

<p>Much acclaim has to be given to the Half Baked Harvest &#8220;Super Simple&#8221; Cookbook. Authored by the one and only Tieghan Gerard (who we interviewed after having our fangirl moment), the recipe curator&#8217;s popular Pinterest creations are now bound together in this beautiful book that you&#8217;ll be flipping through constantly  as we do.</p>



<p>Some callout recipes include her Everyday Pancake Mix, Oven-Baked Cajun Fries and Penne alla Vodka, all of which we&#8217;ve made ourselves. You can&#8217;t beat the less-than-$20 price tag, either.</p>

<p>A moment of silence, please. The GreenPan Reserve Blush 10-Piece Ceramic Non-Stick Cookware Set is truly the most beautiful <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-cookware-sets/">cookware set</a> we&#8217;ve seen (seriously, pink and gold?!) You&#8217;re kidding.</p>



<p>This alluring bundle is a splurge, for sure, but well worth the cost. Crafted from hard-anodized aluminum for even heat distribution and scratch resistance, it&#8217;s stainless steel and ceramic counterparts are just as effective as they are stunning. Plus, each piece is <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-dishwashers-per-experts/">dishwasher</a>-safe.</p>

<ul>

<p>For chillier seasons, we love a knee-high boot. This one from Anne Klein comes in three different colors, is perfect for work and play, and features a comfortable block heel. The side zipper makes it simple to slip on and off, and we love the idea of pairing it with a maxi skirt and tights or a pair of leggings or jeans. </p>

<ul>
<li><strong>Size options</strong>: US 5 to 12</li>
</ul>



<p>When in doubt, gifting <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-slippers-for-men-women-kids/">slippers</a> is never a bad idea. You know what&#8217;s <em>also </em>not a bad idea? Gifting luxe ones from UGG.</p>



<p>The brand&#8217;s Tazz Suede Mule Slippers are available at several online retailers, offer a slight platformed design and  the most important part  are undeniably comfy. We love its signature weaving by the ankles, too.</p>



<p>If you <em>really </em>want to go all-out, pick up the <a href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=93051X1547088&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=nyp-GG---&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nordstrom.com%2Fs%2Fugg-whistler-throw-blanket-nordstrom-exclusive%2F5268285">UGG Whistler Throw Blanket</a> ($98) for a two-in-one <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-cozy-gift-ideas/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">cozy gift</a>. It just so happens to be one of the <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-blankets-we-reviewed/">best blankets we reviewed</a>.</p>

<p>If you want to smell like fall and winter goodness, you&#8217;ll pick up the Aerin Cedar Violet Eau de Parfum. By far, it&#8217;s a fragrance that garners the most compliments (out of the entire perfume tray we have on rotation, may we add) and its warm floral scent notes of violet leaf, Virginia Cedarwood and amber are enough to draw you in. </p>



<p>Don&#8217;t want the full size? No problem. The brand also has its <a href="https://shop-links.co/1817726565832100646?u1=nyp-GG---" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">Cedar Violet Eau de Parfum Mini Size</a> ($35) that&#8217;s even more on-the-go-friendly.</p>

class="wp-element-caption"> <span class="credit">Brooklinen</span></figcaption></figure>



<p>As seen on subway ads and all over Instagram, Brooklinen is a brand with a high regard (among us, too, because we <a href="https://nypost.com/article/brooklinen-sheets-review/">reviewed</a> its sheets  including its <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-cooling-sheets-review/">cooling sheets</a>  and are one step away from writing a love letter.</p>



<p>Its Brooklinen Classic Percale Core Sheet Set is one of our recommendations for anyone who wants to experience hotel-grade comfort. They&#8217;re available in a suite of neutral tones, offered in twin to California King sizing and have that <em>ahh</em>-feeling when you drift away to sleep. They&#8217;re <em>that </em>good.</p>

<p>You can never go wrong with a matching <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-pajamas-for-women/">pajama set</a>, after all. At the top of our list, the Victoria&#8217;s Secret Cotton-Modal Long Pajama Set never disappoints. Its cool, calm and collected charm, coupled with that borrowed-from-the-boys look, makes it a dynamite pair (that&#8217;s also available in blue and green).</p>

<p>Speaking of Dyson, what would a &#8220;best gifts for women&#8221; guide be without a mention of everyone&#8217;s favorite cordless vac? Seriously, you know you&#8217;re an adult when you become giddy over something like this.</p>



<p>And, rightfully so. The brand&#8217;s V12 Detect Slim Vacuum is one of the most impressive of Dyson&#8217;s vacuums we <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-dyson-vacuums/">reviewed</a>, provides live statistics relating to suction power and speed and always leaves us with a pile of dust in the bin that keeps us amazed and satisfied every time (and yes, we deep clean weekly).</p>



<p>For more options, check out our guide to the <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-vacuum-cleaners-review/">best vacuums we reviewed</a>.</p>

<p>Not everyone wants to spend a whole lot on a gift (we get it) and that&#8217;s why the Nordstrom Bliss Plush Throw Blanket is our most-recommended gift of all time  true story. It&#8217;s our most-used blanket that we tested, is just shy of $30, is plush-soft (and we mean <em>plush</em>) and offered in a sea of colors to match your recipient&#8217;s taste. <em>Done and done.</em></p>

<p>Calling all <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-gifts-for-book-lovers/">book lovers</a> (actually, we&#8217;re not calling them  we&#8217;re buying them the Uncommon Goods Book Nook Reading Valet). They&#8217;re too busy flipping pages to pick up the phone, anyway.</p>



<p>As the ultimate $50 gift for book lovers, this original option has a spot for a hardcover or paperback book (so you can pick up where you left off), your <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-glasses-frames-for-men-and-women/">glasses</a> and mug. It&#8217;s an adorable storage trio that she&#8217;ll love. Seriously  she&#8217;ll love it.</p>

class="wp-element-caption"> <span class="credit">CALPAK</span></figcaption></figure>



<p>CALPAK is one of our favorite <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-luggage-brands/">luggage brands</a> because its pieces are durable, look stunning and hold up well. Its Ambeur Front Pocket Carry-On Luggage is no exception, and it even has a spot to store your laptop. No more digging through your filled-to-the-brim carry-all, after all.</p>



<p>Oh, and if you <em>really </em>want to impress your gift recipient? The brand&#8217;s <a href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=93051X1547088&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=nyp-GG---&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.calpaktravel.com%2Fproducts%2Fpower-luggage-tag" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">Portable Charger Luggage Tag</a> ($32) has to be the most genius idea we&#8217;re constantly promoting IRL  though it&#8217;s currently out of stock (*insert crying emoji here*), but you can join the waitlist so you&#8217;re notified ASAP when you can order the accessory.</p>

<p>For the woman who loves to bake, the Caraway 5-Piece Bakeware Set is the real deal. Upon purchase, you&#8217;ll receive two baking sheets, a muffin pan, rectangle pan and cabinet organizers (the latter being a true godsend). There are multiple shades to choose from, too.</p>



<p>Even better, Caraway offers an 11-piece option ($395) that&#8217;s complete with twice the storage, two baking sheets, a muffin pan, two rectangle pans, a cooling rack, a square pan, a loaf pan and two circle pans (for cakes and other treats), if you choose to splurge a bit more.</p>

<p>The perfect gift for the pop-culture-loving, #FreeBritney-obsessed gal in your life. <p>For the one who loves to entertain, there&#8217;s no greater (and cuter) gift than the Williams Sonoma Marble Honeycomb Round Cheese Board with Honeycomb Cheese Knives. The bumblebee accents are just too eye-catching to pass on, and it&#8217;s the elevated <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-charcuterie-boards/">charcuterie board</a> she&#8217;ll be grateful to receive.</p>



<p>To go with, add the <a href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=93051X1547088&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=nyp-GG---&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.williams-sonoma.com%2Fproducts%2Fitalian-classic-cheese-collection%2F" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">Williams Sonoma Italian Classic Cheese Collection</a> ($55) to your online shopping cart as well. It includes one-pound of cheese total, featuring three types of cheeses to accompany your three pieces of cutlery.</p>

<p>There&#8217;s always at least one person on your list who seems to have <em>everything</em>. When running into this conundrum, it&#8217;s best to offer an experience-based gift for her. In our opinion, a cruise doesn&#8217;t sound all too shabby.</p>



<p>Princess Cruises has a variety of ships to sail on and just as many ports and destinations to choose from. The best part? You can choose your room type, enjoy all of its dining and entertaining options and visit a new destination (or two, or three, depending on your specific sailing).</p>

<p>For your BFF, how adorable is the Bestie Definition Makeup Bag? For less than $15, it&#8217;s the easiest pick-me-up on Amazon (and one she&#8217;ll love stashing her <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-foundation-brushes-according-to-makeup-artists/">foundation brushes</a> and <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-concealers-review/">concealers</a> into  guaranteed).</p>



<p>Pro tip: pick up some <a href="https://shop-links.co/1816142231099078989?u1=nyp-GG---" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">mini makeup products at Sephora</a> to stash inside, along with a bow and <em>voil! </em>Best gift ever.</p>

https://nypost.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2024/01/dior.jpg?resize=50,33&amp;quality=75&amp;strip=all 50w" sizes="(max-width: 1023px) 100vw, 1023px" /></a><figcaption class="wp-element-caption"> <span class="credit">Dior</span></figcaption></figure>



<p>Let her enhance her natural beauty with the Dior Addict Lip Glow Oil, a New York Post reporter (absolute) favorite. This luxurious lip product not only adds a touch of color but also nourishes and hydrates the lips. Perfect for the woman who values both style and self-care, this lip oil is a glamorous addition to her beauty routine and a charming gift.</p>

<p>This dainty and elegant piece of jewelry is a thoughtful gift that adds a touch of individuality to her look. Choose her initial for a personalized touch, making it a meaningful and stylish accessory for the woman who values unique and sentimental gifts.</p>

					result = regexp.exec( document.cookie );

				return ( null === result ) ? null : result[1];
			}

					links[i].href.indexOf('amazon.com') > 0

					});

						var currentGaEvent = links[i].dataset.gaEvent;
						if (Array.isArray(currentGaEvent)) {
							currentGaEvent.push(amazonGaEvent);
							gaEventData = currentGaEvent;
						} else {
							gaEventData = '['+currentGaEvent+','+amazonGaEvent+']';
						}
					} else {
						gaEventData = amazonGaEvent;
					}

						var currentGa4Event = links[i].dataset.ga4Event;

				<script type="text/javascript">
			// Send an event on clicks for link elements with data-nyp-affiliate="true", wait until the document has loaded.
			document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
				const affiliateLinks = document.querySelectorAll('a[data-nyp-affiliate="true"]');
				// Return early if we don't have any links.
				if ( ! affiliateLinks ) {
					return;
				}
				// Loop through the links and add the event listener.
				affiliateLinks.forEach(function(link) {
					link.addEventListener('click', function(event) {

						const {
							nypScripts: {
								nypost_wp_vars: {
									nypostSite: siteId = '',
								} = {},
							} = {},
						} = window;

						// Check if we are on the element with the a[data-nyp-affiliate="true"].
						let link = event.target;
						if ( 'true' !== link.dataset.nypAffiliate ) {
							// If not, get the closest one then get the href from that.
							link = event.target.closest('a[data-nyp-affiliate="true"]');
						}

						// Get the URL from the link.
						let href = link.href || '';

						// Bail if we don't have a href.
						if ( ! href ) {
							return;
						}

						// If the URL does not have the protocol we need to add it or URL() will throw an error.
						if (!href.startsWith('http://') && !href.startsWith('https://')) {
							href = 'https://' + href;
						}

						// Get the URL from the link.
						if (href.match(new RegExp(`https?://go.${siteId}.com/`))) {
							// Extract the URL from the skimlinks href.
							href = new URL(href).searchParams.get('url') || href;
						}

						// Get the URL hostname, for example: www.amazon.com.
						const retailer = new URL(href).hostname;

						gtag('event', 'outbound', {
							'internal_source': window.location.href,
							'external_destination': href,
							'retailer': retailer,
							'post_id': "19292869",
						});
					});
				});
			});
		</script>

<script type='text/javascript' src='https://nypost.com/wp-content/mu-plugins/jetpack-13.0/_inc/build/sharedaddy/sharing.min.js?ver=13.0' id='sharing-js-js'></script>
<script type="text/javascript">
	var windowOpen;
	document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
		const shareLinks = document.querySelectorAll('li.share-facebook a');
		shareLinks.forEach(function(shareLink) {
			// Exclude email from opening in modal window.
			if ( shareLink.href.indexOf('mailto') !== -1 ) {
				return;
			}

			shareLink.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
				event.preventDefault();
				if ( 'undefined' !== typeof windowOpen ){ // If there's another sharing window open, close it.
					windowOpen.close();
				}
				windowOpen = window.open( shareLink.href, 'wpcomfacebook', 'menubar=1,resizable=1,width=600,height=400' );
			});
		});
	});
</script>
